Blogspot vs Wordpress.org

03 Mar 2017

Although its a personal referece which platform to use, and both of them have their cons and pros, leaving a result, that neither of the two is better than the other one. This infographic from visually gives good reason to use both, have a view on the infographic and you can always decide which one to use.
